entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
